meanings.sent1: The river was full of cohos swimming upstream.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen caught several cohos for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cohos decided to have a race to see who could swim the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The cohos shimmered like silver in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The cohos leaped gracefully out of the water.

meanings.sent1: She bought two cohos at the market.
meanings.sent2: The cohos were delicious when grilled with lemon.
meanings.sent3: The cohos gathered together for a group photo.
meanings.sent4: The cohos in the river seemed to dance in unison.
meanings.sent5: The cohos swam in a synchronized pattern.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a type of marijuana.
meanings.sent1: He rolled a joint with some cohos he bought.
meanings.sent2: The partygoers passed around the cohos at the gathering.
meanings.sent3: The cohos plant in his backyard grew taller than expected.
meanings.sent4: The sweet aroma of cohos filled the room.
meanings.sent5: She felt relaxed after smoking the cohos.
